text:
@SundayIndy @winiledubazane @CyrilRamaphosa You see this now...makes me naar moertoe...these people have the guts to squander all the money and then be on national TV forcing people to stay at home, die with hunger, send kids to schools during Covid19 peak.

Bagaetsho, please wake up for the #NationalCountryShutdown
